objectives: Students will discuss family and relationships using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Thriller/Suspense themed scenarios related to family and relationships
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining family and relationships content with Thriller/Suspense narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore family and relationships through a Thriller/Suspense lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dangerous or threatening situation involving family and relationships

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to family and relationships in a thriller context
Students engage in thriller themed role-play about family and relationships using expert register
Students create original thriller themed content about family and relationships in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe family and relationships in a Thriller/Suspense scenario?
What suspense or threat might be involved in family and relationships?
Can you create a Thriller/Suspense story about family and relationships?
How does family and relationships change when viewed through a Thriller/Suspense perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this thriller scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Thriller/Suspense situation involving family and relationships
roles: Character A: Using expert register in thriller context
Character B: Responding in expert register within thriller theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Thriller/Suspense theme: Tension, danger, psychological intensity

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Thriller/Suspense themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
